TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit LinePragmaCodeInfo extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains properties for a script block being parsed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks During page parsing, information about a script block is stored in the LinePragmaCodeInfo class. This class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.SimpleWebHandlerParser> class.
LinePragmaCodeInfo is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](../Topic/.NET%20Framework%20Versions%20and%20Dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks To use the properties of a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo> instance, use the constructor overload that takes parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Code located within the \<% %> tags is referred to as a "nugget".
